title: Okonomiyaki (Japanese Pancake)
ingredients: 1  sausage, diced, or more to taste (Optional)
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or to taste
1 tablespoon panko bread crumbs, or to taste
method: Step 1: Mix flour and water together in a bowl until smooth. Stir in cabbage, bacon, eggs, sausage, green onions, shrimp, cheese, and tenkasu.
Step 2: Preheat a griddle to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) and coat with oil.
Step 3: Pour 1/4 of batter onto preheated griddle. Cook until golden brown, about 6 minutes per side. Transfer to a serving plate. Repeat to make a total of 4 pancakes.
Step 4: Make sauce: Mix soy sauce, ketchup, and vinegar together in a small bowl. Drizzle over pancakes.
Step 5: Garnish with panko and mayonnaise.
